string.name: BuyTypeDao_getListByCustLevel_2000000000
string.Data: SELECT A.id , A.name , A.code FROM ( SELECT ID id , code , Title|| \' \' || PUName name FROM tblBuyType WHERE Code=1 UNION SELECT ID id , code , Title|| \' \' || PUName name FROM tblBuyType WHERE Code=6 AND ID <=2000000183 ) A order by A.code

string.name: BuyTypeDao_getListByCustLevel_2000000003
string.Data: SELECT A.id , A.name , A.code FROM ( SELECT ID id , code , Title|| \' \' || PUName name FROM tblBuyType WHERE Code=1 UNION SELECT ID id , code , Title|| \' \' || PUName name FROM tblBuyType WHERE Code=6 AND ID <=2000000198 UNION SELECT ID id , code , Title|| \' \' || PUName name FROM tblBuyType WHERE Code=5 AND ID <=2000000156 ) A order by A.code

string.name: BuyTypeDao_getListByCustLevel_2000000004
